etymologies: mid 19th century (in an earlier sense). From crypto- + -phyte

definitions: A plant in which the dormant buds are below the surface of the soil or submerged under water.

notes.text: Chamaephyte, hemicryptophyte, phanerophyte, and therophyte are the other categories in Raunkiaer's original classification of plant life forms.

definitions: A unicellular flagellate of the phylum Cryptophyta; a cryptomonad.
